props.name: showMenu
props.docs:
Controls the visibility of the menu toggle button based on the context of the application header.

When the application header is utilized outside the application frame, the menu toggle button is displayed.
Conversely, if the header is within the application frame, this property is ineffective.

props.name: categories
props.docs:
Configuration object hash used to populate the dropdown menu for type-ahead and quick selection functionality.
Each ID maps to an object with a label and an array of options to select from.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If true the filter will be in disabled state

props.name: filterState
props.docs: A set of search criteria to populate the component with.

props.name: hideIcon
props.docs:
Allows to hide the icon inside the text input.
Defaults to false

props.name: i18nPlainText
props.docs: i18n

props.name: icon
props.docs:
The icon next to the actual text input
Defaults to 'search'

props.name: labelCategories
props.docs: i18n

props.name: nonSelectableCategories
props.docs:
In certain use cases some categories may not be available for selection anymore.
To allow proper display of set filters with these categories this ID to label mapping can be populated.

Configuration object hash used to supply labels to the filter chips in the input field.
Each ID maps to a string representing the label to display.

props.name: placeholder
props.docs: Placeholder text to be displayed in an empty input field.

props.name: readonly
props.docs: If true the filter will be in readonly mode

props.name: repeatCategories
props.docs:
If set to true, allows that a single category can be set more than once.
An already set category will not appear in the category dropdown if set to false.

Defaults to true

props.name: staticOperator
props.docs:
If set categories will always be filtered via the respective logical operator.
Toggling of the operator will not be available to the user.

props.name: suggestions
props.docs: A list of strings that will be supplied as type-ahead suggestions not tied to any categories.

events.docs: Event dispatched whenever a category gets selected in the dropdown
Event dispatched whenever the filter state changes.
Event dispatched whenever the filter gets cleared.
Event dispatched whenever the text input changes.

props.name: customRangeAllowed
props.docs:
Controls whether the user is allowed to pick custom date ranges in the component.
When set to 'true', the user can select a custom date range using the date picker.
When set to 'false', only predefined time date ranges are available for selection.

props.name: dateRangeId
props.docs:
Used to set the initial select date range as well as the button name,
if not set or no according date range label is found, nothing will be selected

props.name: from
props.docs:
Picker date. If the picker is in range mode this property is the start date.
If set to `null` no default start date will be pre-selected.

Format is based on `format`

props.name: weekStartIndex
props.docs:
The index of which day to start the week on, based on the Locale#weekdays array.
E.g. if the locale is en-us, weekStartIndex = 1 results in starting the week on monday.

This method returns the selected date range as a `DateChangeEvent` object.

The event payload contains information about the selected date range.
